steps: Melt and carefully brown the 8 tbsp of butter. Cook until it has a golden hue and transfer into a mixing bowl. Let it cool for 5 mins
In the same mixing bowl add both the white and brown sugar. Mix until the butter is fully incorporated and the sugars are nice and fluffy.
Add one egg and mix until fully incorporated
Add the vanilla, salt, and baking soda. Mix until fully incorporated
Add the flour and chocolate chips. Mix until no white flour is visible.
Scoop batter into round dough balls on a parchment-lined baking sheet. Each one should be 2 inches apart
Bake for about 10-12 mins. Once done let it cool for 5-8 mins and Enjoy!
